xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 21 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 12:15 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 12:18 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu1 12:19 <sdumitriu1> Hey 12:19 <sdumitriu1> How's it going? 12:19 <bvancea> pretty good 12:19 <bvancea> just came back from the conference 12:19 <sdumitriu1> How was the conference? 12:19 <bvancea> like 20 minutes ago 12:19 <bvancea> it was really nice 12:19 <bvancea> a really good practice for my diploma exam 12:20 <bvancea> some of the other presentation were also nice 12:20 <bvancea> there was this invited guest who was kind of boring 12:20 <bvancea> but it was nice overall 12:21 <bvancea> and how is your day? 12:25 <bvancea> hmmm, a little of topic, they've changed github a bit 12:29 <sdumitriu1> Fixed a bug 12:30 <sdumitriu1> Good so far 12:30 <sdumitriu1> Yes, I've seen the changes since a few days 12:30 <bvancea> hmm, I think I liked the old design more 12:31 <sdumitriu1> It' 12:31 <bvancea> this one is a little faster I guess, less ajax 12:31 <sdumitriu1> s harder to find things now, until I get used to it 12:31 <sdumitriu1> But I think it has a little more space for longer text 12:31 <bvancea> yeah 12:32 <bvancea> that minimalist design 12:32 <bvancea> with buttons/menus being just icons 12:32 <bvancea> and no text 12:32 <bvancea> is a little confusing for me 12:32 <bvancea> but its sort of a trend these days 12:33 <bvancea> anyway, I'll be working on the variant parser/indexer 12:33 <bvancea> its waaaay to slow 12:34 <bvancea> I've checked it a couple of this last night, the lowest time I got was around 15 minutes for around 200k variants 12:34 <bvancea> which is annoyingly slow 12:35 <bvancea> I think my mistake might come from the fact that I'm adding one variant at a time to the SolrServer class 12:36 <bvancea> and I think that actually sends some data to solr 12:36 <bvancea> even if its not commited 12:36 <bvancea> I should group some variants before adding them 12:38 <sdumitriu1> Yes 12:40 <bvancea> I'm not sure how I thought it doesn't send the file to solr 12:41 <bvancea> since if it didn't, I should have gotten an out of memory exception 13:04 <bvancea> nice, a lot of commits today 13:04 <bvancea> :D 14:28 <bvancea> so I've added a buffer for the variants in the indexing service 14:28 <bvancea> and I only send the documents to solr when I reach a certain number of variants 14:28 <bvancea> and now it takes around 40-50 seconds to index the 200k variants 14:28 <sdumitriu1> Much better 14:29 <bvancea> I'm gonna play with the buffer size a bit 14:29 <bvancea> see how much I can give it without having to add extra space to the jvm memory 14:30 <bvancea> I've got 42 seconds for a buffer size of 1500 19:11 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant
